short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert blog posts to EPUB files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome extension allows users to easily select multiple links on a blog page and view them in the extension's page. Users can then download the selected links as an EPUB file for offline reading.

How to use:
Step-by-step instructions are also available at https://blog2epub.vercel.app/
1. Install the extension from chrome web store.
2. Open your blog's homepage and select the hyperlinks of the articles you want to convert.
3. Click "Generate EPUB" to open the options page and confirm your selection.
4. Download EPUB.
